statements: DELETE FROM task_aggregations WHERE task_id = 1 AND dataset_name = 'dataset1';
DELETE FROM task_aggregations WHERE aggregation_type = 'average' AND aggregation_result >= 100.00;
DELETE FROM tasks WHERE task_id = 10 AND dataset_size > 1000;
DELETE FROM aggregates WHERE aggregate_id = 5 OR (task_id > 20 AND result <= 500.00);
DELETE FROM AggregationLog WHERE success = FALSE;
DELETE FROM Aggregates WHERE task_name = 'Cleanup' AND dataset_name = 'Logs'
DELETE FROM dataset_info WHERE dataset_owner = 'John Smith';
